column2: Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your own character portrait, in order to become a Chaos Knight.
Deep inside the Pyramid of Nagash is said to be a vault, cursed with Undead magic by the fabled Necromancer himself. Only very few know what secrets it truly holds.
Periodically attracts the servitude of §GGreat Warriors§! (if §Y[From.Founder.Religion.GetName]§!)
column3: Attire périodiquement les services de §Ggrands guerriers§! (si §Y[From.Founder.Religion.GetName]§!)
column4: Zieht regelmäßig §GGroße Krieger§! an (bei gleicher §YReligion§! wie der §YGründer§!)
column6: Atrae periódicamente el servicio de §Ggrandes guerreros§! (si tienen la misma §Yreligión§! que §YFounder§!)

column2: Constant Drachenfels, the Great Enchanter is an infamous daemonologist and necromancer.

The Great Enchanter is a devil in human form, who cheated Death for centuries unknown, a man with appetites so base they lay beyond satiation, a necromancer, torturer of the dead, dismember of spirits, a vileness made flesh, a wizard, a scholar, a monster. Untold are the reaches of his barbarities, uncounted the number of his treacheries, beyond belief the depravities of his practices. Was ever such a vileness born of mortal flesh?
Is a Elector Count of the Empire

The war has been going on for 29 years now though for a large part of that time only small skirmishes has been fought, but of recent the Reiklanders has put Imperial Nuln under a full nation blackade and are marching troops towards our borders. \nImperial Nuln and her allies are suffering from lack of supplies and is only getting worse by the month for this war to be won it must happen quick.
This character is suffering from severre war exhaustion and will devastate their country if the war doesn't end soon.
